abstract.p: Photos of several splashy print shirts, urban alternative to Hawaiian shirts, which have become tourist uniform in New York City (On the Street column) (M)

block.p: Wow! Wham! Bam! There's a new splashy print shirt, an urban alternative to the Hawaiian shirts that have become a tourist uniform in recent years. Samurai warriors, Japanese anime characters, fierce tigers, dragons and calligraphy are flamboyantly printed on both front and back, but the design makes its most powerful impact on the back. Priced under $30 on 125th Street, the shirt has yet to be sighted in the Hamptons.
